weka.classifiers.timeseries.gui

Class SimpleConfigPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • weka.classifiers.timeseries.gui.SimpleConfigPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SimpleConfigPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class that renders a simple configuration panel for configuring a time series forecaster.
    Version:
    $Revision: 52593 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
